nodes.bodyText: Hmm… is this really the proper way to do this?
I found this stackoverflow answer and then did that, but if you know a cleaner way if there is, I'd be pleased to change it.

I think this is the cleanest way to do this. 👍
Or at least the best way I know :)
Opus is with a capital O, however I'd suggest to not mention that at all, but just HLS, since the tracks that have Opus HLS streams, also have MP3 HLS streams.
